name: Depth Motion with Foreground/Background
description: Tests depth motion coherence with foreground subject and background activity - validates multi-plane temporal consistency

sceneContext.summary: Coffee cup in sharp focus with barista working in blurred background
sceneContext.environment: Warm coffee shop interior with wooden counter, steam rising from cup, shallow depth of field

startKeyframe.prompt: A steaming ceramic coffee cup in sharp focus on a wooden counter, cream colored cup with latte art, warm ambient lighting, shallow depth of field, blurred background shows barista in black apron at espresso machine, coffee shop interior, cozy atmosphere, professional photography, 4K resolution, static camera, clean composition
startKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry foreground, deep focus, multiple cups, text, watermark, outdoor, night, cold lighting, abstract shapes, close-up face

endKeyframe.prompt: A steaming ceramic coffee cup in sharp focus on a wooden counter, cream colored cup with latte art, warm ambient lighting, shallow depth of field, blurred background shows barista in black apron reaching for cup on shelf, coffee shop interior, cozy atmosphere, professional photography, 4K resolution, static camera, clean composition
endKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry foreground, deep focus, multiple cups, text, watermark, outdoor, night, cold lighting, abstract shapes, close-up face

videoContext.motionDescription: Foreground coffee cup remains perfectly still with rising steam, background barista moves subtly reaching for a cup on the shelf, maintaining depth separation
videoContext.cameraMotion: Completely static camera locked in place, no camera movement

expectedBehavior.primary: Foreground cup maintains exact position and appearance, steam rises naturally
expectedBehavior.secondary: Background barista moves naturally while staying in soft focus, depth of field preserved
expectedBehavior.challenges: Maintaining depth separation, natural steam motion, background subject consistency in blur
